plot: A look at the life of Bram Stoker and the various influences on the creation of his most famous novel and character, 'Dracula'.
title: Bram Stoker agus Dracula
plot_es: A look at the life of Bram Stoker and the various influences on the creation of his most famous novel and character, 'Dracula'.
plot_en: A look at the life of Bram Stoker and the various influences on the creation of his most famous novel and character, 'Dracula'.
